insert-new-channel-mixer: INSERT INTO channels (channel_id, user_id, token, user_avatar_url, banner_url, vods_enabled, has_vods, description, language, date_joined, date_first_scraped, social, verified, audience) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update-channel-mixer: UPDATE channels SET token=?, user_avatar_url=?, banner_url=?, vods_enabled=?, has_vods=?, description=?, language=?, social=?, verified=?, audience=? WHERE channel_id={channel_id};
insert-livestream-snapshot-mixer: INSERT INTO livestream_snapshots (channel_id, game_id, date_scraped, viewers) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-game-mixer: INSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, parent, description, cover_url, background_url) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-game-snapshot-mixer: INSERT INTO game_snapshots (game_id, date_scraped, num_channels, num_zero, total_viewers, min_viewers, max_viewers, median_viewers, mean_viewers, std_dev_viewers) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-recording-mixer: INSERT INTO recordings (recording_id, channel_id, game_id, date_scraped, date_uploaded, views, duration) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
